topic-1.user_query: Are there any methods to relieve shoulder and neck pain while in the office?
implicit_needs: Recommended Efficient Stretching Exercises for the Office Environment
Help develop the habit of regular activity.
topic-1.requirement: The user requires a set of stretching exercise recommendations suitable for an office environment that are easy to perform and efficient. They also hope to incorporate a reminder mechanism and habit-forming design to help gradually develop a routine of regular activity, thereby effectively alleviating shoulder and neck pain.

pos: 在手机提醒的基础上增加电脑弹窗提醒功能，以确保不会错过定时活动提示。
每天午休时抽出5分钟练习深呼吸配合轻微肩部旋转放松肌肉。
neg: Place the water cup a bit farther from your workstation to force yourself to stand up and stretch your shoulders and neck when getting water.
Set fixed time periods (such as 10:00 AM and 3:00 PM) to leave your seat for a 5-minute walk while moving your shoulders.

candidate_solutions.solution: Try doing simple shoulder and neck stretches for 30 seconds every hour, such as slowly tilting your head side to side and nodding forward and backward.
Use the office chair against the wall and perform several alternating movements of straightening and relaxing your back while seated.
Add a computer pop-up reminder feature based on the mobile phone reminder to ensure that timed activity alerts are not missed.
Place the water cup slightly away from your workstation to make yourself get up and stretch your shoulders and neck when fetching water.
Download an office-specific fitness app and follow its guidance to complete brief yet efficient localized stretching exercises.
Set fixed time intervals (such as 10 a.m. and 3 p.m.) to leave your seat for a 5-minute walk while moving your shoulders.
Adjust the monitor height to eye level to reduce shoulder and neck strain caused by looking downward.
Take five minutes during your lunch break each day to practice deep breathing combined with gentle shoulder rotations to relax your muscles.

topic-2.user_query: How can one better balance work and family life?
implicit_needs: Specific strategies to reduce overtime frequency
Plan work tasks appropriately to avoid backlog.
topic-2.requirement: The user hopes to achieve a more balanced allocation of work and family time by reducing the frequency of overtime and optimizing work task management, thereby improving the quality of marital relationships and overall quality of life.

pos: 与伴侣共同规划周末活动，提前预留专属时间增进彼此感情。
设置下班后的“无工作模式”，比如关闭邮件通知以专注于家庭生活。
neg: Schedule a regular family meeting once a week to discuss how to better balance work and life demands.
Record the actual reasons for daily overtime work and periodically reflect on whether there is room for improvement.

candidate_solutions.solution: Create a daily task list and prioritize important items to avoid procrastination that leads to overtime work.
Learn to appropriately decline non-urgent or low-priority work requests to free up more time for family.
Set up a "no-work mode" after work hours, such as turning off email notifications to focus on family life.
Plan weekend activities with your partner and set aside dedicated time in advance to strengthen your bond.
Improve efficiency by adopting the Pomodoro Technique, optimizing time management through focused work for 25 minutes followed by a 5-minute break.
Schedule a regular family meeting once a week to discuss how to better balance work and life demands.
Record the actual reasons for daily overtime work and periodically reflect on whether there is room for improvement.
After returning home in the evening, spend 15 minutes organizing the day's work summary before fully immersing yourself in family interactions.
